column3: str
A pleasure to see you again. Have you come to meet more Yo-kai? Or perhaps browse my array of special armaments?
Well if it isn't the master weapons collector <If(PlayerParameter(4))>herself<Else/>himself</If>! How may I be of service to you?
You <Emphasis>lost</Emphasis> the Yo-kai Medallium!? ...Oh well, I can give you another. Here.
Receive the Yo-kai Medallium?
Yes
No
What would you like to do?
Purchase Minions.
Purchase Weapons.
Small Talk.
Cancel.

Which minion will you choose?
(Yo-kai Medals Required: <Value>IntegerParameter(1)</Value>, Bag: <Value>IntegerParameter(2)</Value>)
<Sheet(Companion,IntegerParameter(1),0)/>.
Cancel.
Choose this minion?
Yes
No
Why, you've befriended all the Yo-kai I've brought with me! Might it be said that you're quite taken by them? If so, I suggest you come and visit my homeland where you can find more. So many more.
Hmm... You appear to be lacking the required medals. Apologies, but business is business─I'll have to ask you to come back when you've found some more.
Yo-kai Medals can be obtained by completing FATEs while equipped with the Yo-kai Watch.
Yo-kai Medals can be found at FATEs in the following 13 areas:

The Black Shroud: Central, East, South, and North
La Noscea: Middle, Lower, Western, Upper, and Outer
Thanalan: Central, Western, Eastern, and Southern
Unable to obtain <Sheet(Item,IntegerParameter(1),0)/> due to insufficient inventory space or having already obtained the item.
Let's get you acquainted, then. Meet your new friend, <Sheet(Companion,IntegerParameter(1),0)/>! I hope you two will get along!
Which weapon will you purchase?

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15208))>Paladin's Sword<Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15209))>Monk's Fists.<Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15210))>Warrior's Axe.<Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15211))>Dragoon's Spear.<Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15212))>Bard's Bow.<Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15213))>Ninja's Knives.<Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15214))>Dark Knight's Claymore.<Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15215))>Machinist's Musketoon.<Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15216))>White Mage's Cane.<Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15217))>Black Mage's Rod.<Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15218))>Summoner's Grimoire.<Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15219))>Scholar's Codex.<Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(1),15220))>Astrologian's Globe.<Else/></If></If></If></If></If></If></If></If></If></If></If></If></If><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(2),0))><Else/> and Shield.</If> (<Sheet(Item,IntegerParameter(3),0)/>: <Value>IntegerParameter(4)</Value>/<Value>IntegerParameter(5)</Value>)
Cancel.
Purchase this weapon?
Yes
No

I'm afraid you'll have to come back when you acquire some Legendary Medals. I understand obtaining such rare pieces can be difficult, but think of the marvelous rewards you will reap for your efforts! I believe in you!
Legendary Yo-kai Medals can be obtained, albeit at a low probability, by participating in FATEs designated in the Yo-kai Medallium while accompanied by the Yo-kai minion designated on the medal.
Cannot obtain <Sheet(Item,IntegerParameter(1),0)/> and <Sheet(Item,IntegerParameter(2),0)/> due to insufficient inventory space or having already obtained the items.
Cannot obtain <Sheet(Item,IntegerParameter(1),0)/> due to insufficient inventory space or having already obtained the item.
Sword and shield, eh? That's my favorite kind. Here you are, your <Sheet(Item,IntegerParameter(1),0)/> and <Sheet(Item,IntegerParameter(2),0)/>.
Here you are, your new weapon! Go on, try it out!
The number of Legendary Yo-kai Medals required to purchase Yo-kai weapons from Nohi has increased. Participate in FATEs to earn more medals.

Why did I choose to travel to Eorzea? Aside from business, I also came to visit a friend of mine. He's prone to wandering himself, but I always know when he's close by the jangling sound he makes when he walks.
Speaking of jangling, I found my coin pouch rather empty after I arrived at the Gold Saucer. I must have dropped some medals from my homeland when I made my way here after searching for Whisper.
Yo-kai Medals can be obtained by completing FATEs while equipped with the Yo-kai Watch.
Yo-kai Medals can be found at FATEs in the following 13 areas:

The Black Shroud: Central, East, South, and North
La Noscea: Middle, Lower, Western, Upper, and Outer
Thanalan: Central, Western, Eastern, and Southern
Legendary Medals can be obtained, albeit at a low probability, by participating in FATEs in areas designated in the Yo-kai Medallium while accompanied by the Yo-kai minion designated on the medal.

The Yo-kai Medallium can be accessed from the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Key Items<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> menu or the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Minion Guide<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Should you lose the Yo-kai Medallium, you may speak with Nohi again during the event to obtain another. Please take care not to discard the item by accident.
My friend, this must be one of the finest exchanges I've had in my travels. I cannot recall the last time an adventurer purchased every single weapon I had to offer. I must say I'm impressed!
Ah! It appears my old friend has come to visit me. Well, don't be shy, now! Come on over!
My apologies, Nohi. I did not want to intrude on what looked like a lively conversation between the two of you.

I'll say. <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/> just finished acquiring all thirteen of my finest weapons! Built <If(PlayerParameter(4))>herself<Else/>himself</If> quite an arsenal, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>she<Else/>he</If> did!
All thirteen!? Well then, allow me to extend my congratulations to you as well.
It must have been as tedious as taming a warlion. I can imagine how thrilled you must feel, having obtained long sought-after rewards.
Yes indeed, tantalizing rewards, for adventurers who throw themselves headfirst into the heat of <Emphasis>savage</Emphasis> battles. Wouldn't you agree, my minstrel friend?
W─Wait just a moment, we need not discuss such complicated matters now. After all, we are in the midst of celebrating <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>his</If> achievement, are we not?
Indeed. It's a shame my stay in Eorzea is only temporary. I'm rather curious to see what becomes of your story. Rather, on behalf of my company, I would like to─
Right, have fun, you two!
Hey, come back here! I still have some affairs to speak with you about! Hmph. He's always so elusive when I mention the savagery of combat.
Nevertheless, I was saying perhaps we can go on an adventure on our own somewhere in the future. As friends! Until then, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>.
